titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.
Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the House of Representatives (together with the Senate) to notify the President that a quorum of each chamber of Congress has assembled.
